description.narrative: Output 3.3: Strengthened national capacity to legislate, coordinate, plan and monitor scaling-up of rights- and gender-sensitive interventions to promote safe drinking water, adequate sanitation and good hygiene practices.

sector.narrative: WASH - Enabling environment (policies/strategies, coordination, regulation, financing, planning-monitoring-review, sector capacity development and professionalization)

description.narrative: Water supply and Sanitation policy, planning and administration

title.narrative: Zimbabwe United Nations Development Assistance Framework

2018 Zimbabwe: End of project evaluation for a water sanitation ans hygiene project in satellite schools
2020 Zimbabwe: Evaluation of the Small Towns WASH Programme (STWP) in Zimbabwe

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 3.3: Strengthened national capacity to legislate, coordinate, plan and monitor scaling-up of rights- and gender-sensitive interventions to promote safe drinking water, adequate sanitation and good hygiene practices.

description.narrative: UNICEF strengthened the capacity of government to monitor WASH services through monitoring systems such as the Rural WASH Information Management System and Rapid Pro; as a result, 85% of urban centers and rural districts have functional monitoring systems. Also, the first comprehensive WASH joint sector review (JSR) since 2011 was undertaken, a key step in settling the direction for the sector in the country. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: National monitoring systems reporting on equity of access to WASH services available
Proportion of functional NAC sub structures
National strategy to eliminate open defecation available with a systemic approach to gender

baseline.value: Draft Sanitation and Hygiene Policy Developed

target.value: 2020:Operational Plan for Sanitation and Hygiene Strategy Approved

actual.value: 2019:Sanitation and Hygiene Policy to be submitted to cabinet
